rukus.text: geuleona hananim-eul dulyeowo ha neun jadeul-egeneun eunhyeui cheongug-i iss nani
hananim-i mid-eum-ui baegseongdeul-eul joein-ui baegseongdeulcheoleom daeuhalyeo hasigessneunyo
dodaeche neohuiga geuleon pandan-eul haneun iyuga mueos-inyo
neohuiga baeul su issneun han seong seoga iss-eossneunyo
neohuiga geu an-eseo seontaeghal mueos-i iss-eossneunyo
simpan-ui nalkkaji neohuiga wonha neun geos-i neohuiege ileulila hana nim-ui seong-yag-ilado bad-assneunyo
geudaeyeo geudeul gaunde nuga geugeos-eul bojanghal geos-inji geudeul-ege mul-eobola
geudeul-ege singwa daedeunghan muli ui donglyoga issdaneun geonyo geudeul-i jin sil-ilamyeon geudeul-ui mulideul-eul ileuge hala
gahoghan jaeang-i iss-eul geunal-e geudeul-eun buboghala buleum-eul bad-euna geuleohgehal sudo eobsnola
geudeul-ui nundeul-eun alaelo cheojyeo issgo gul-yog-i geudeul-eul aewossanola geudeul-i geonjeonhaess-eul ttae buboghala bu leum-eul bad-assnola
geuleomeulo i mesejileul geoyeog han jadeul-eul na-ege matgila geudeul-i insighaji moshaneun banghyang-eulobuteo jeomchalo beol-eul julila
naega geudeul-eul ilsijeog-eulo yu yehana sillo naui gyehoeg-eun hwaggoha nila
geudaega geudeul-ege bosang-eul yo guhayeo geudeul-i buchaelo jim-eul jigo issneunyo
boiji anhneun geos-i geudeulgyeot-e iss-eo geudeul-i geugeos-eul gilog-ilado hal su issneunyo
geuleomeulo innaehala geuttae ju nim-ui myeonglyeong-i iss-eul geos-ini nohayeo goham-eul chyeossdeon mulgogiui muliga doe ji malla
junim-ui eunhyega geuege bepul eojiji ani haess-eumyeon beolgeobeos-eun chae bulmoui ttang-e beolyeojyeo binan-eul badgo iss-eoss-eulila
geuleona junim-eun geuleul seontaegha sa uiloun ja jung-e issge hasyeossnola
bulsinjadeul-i geu gyohun-eul deul-eul ttaemyeon geudeul-ui nun-eulosseo geudaeleul goe lobhimyeo sillo geuyamallo michinjala malhadeola
geuleona geugeos-eun bunmyeong on inlyuleul wihan gyohun-ila
